title: go.tools/cmd/goimports: missing blank line before github import
body:
Some grouping logic in goimports causes it to order two sequential imports incorrectly.

Here's a very simple repro: http://play.golang.org/p/lPbRjVaFvS

When you hit "Format" you can see that the ordering of "gu" and
"github.com/foo/bar" depends on whether "Imports" is checked.
